Nanhua county in Chuxiong Yi autonomous prefecture 楚雄彞族自治州|楚雄彝族自治州[Chu3 xiong2 Yi2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan
South China Morning Post (newspaper in Hong Kong)

sentences.english: The Post said production had been halted for five days at the plant.
sentences.chinese: 南华早报说，生产已经停止5天了。

sentences.english: I graduated from Nanhua Univercity in Hengyang of Hunan Province.
sentences.chinese: 我毕业于湖南衡阳的南华大学。

sentences.english: Realgar is the most important mineral of commercial value in the Nanhua As-Tl deposit, Yunnan Province.
sentences.chinese: 雄黄是云南省南华砷铊矿床中最主要工业矿物。

sentences.english: It summarizes the preliminary results of optimizing reform of clinical medical specialty in Nanhua University.
sentences.chinese: 总结了南华大学临床医学专业优化改革的初步成效。

sentences.english: Your ad in the June 12 Nanhua Morning could have been written especially with me in mind.
sentences.chinese: 日《南华早报》上所刊登的广告似乎是专为我而作。

sentences.english: The Scenic Vale is 13km away from Nanhua, taking about 10 minutes by car.
sentences.chinese: 风情谷距南华13公里，需要10分钟左右的车程。
